name: FScrollBoxStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SScrollBox

TopShadowBrush: Brush used to draw the top shadow of a scrollbox
BottomShadowBrush: Brush used to draw the bottom shadow of a scrollbox
LeftShadowBrush: Brush used to draw the left shadow of a scrollbox
RightShadowBrush: Brush used to draw the right shadow of a scrollbox
HorizontalScrolledContentPadding: Padding scroll panel that presents the scrolled content
VerticalScrolledContentPadding: Padding scroll panel that presents the scrolled content
